mapper.select: SELECT u.firstname as firstname, u.lastname as lastname, u.email as email, u.phone as phone, n.name as neighbour, a.street as street, a.number as number, a.reference as reference FROM `user` u, `address` a, `neighbour` n WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} AND u.address_id=a.address_id AND a.neighbour_id=n.neighbour_id AND u.tx_status=1 AND a.tx_status=1 AND n.tx_status=1 GROUP BY a.address_id;

SELECT o.order_id as orderId, o.date as date, o.state as state, n.name as neighbour, a.street as street, a.number as number, x.total as total FROM `order` o, `neighbour` n, `address` a, `cart` x, `delivery` d WHERE o.user_id=#{userId} AND o.address_id=a.address_id AND o.cart_id=x.cart_id AND o.delivery_id=d.delivery_id AND n.neighbour_id=a.neighbour_id

SELECT o.order_id as orderId, o.date as date, o.state as state, x.total as total, p.image as image, n.name as neighbour, a.street as street, a.number as number, p.product_name as productName, xd.qtty as qtty, p.price as price FROM `order` o, `address` a, `neighbour` n, `product` p, `cart` x, `cart_detail` xd, `delivery` d WHERE o.user_id=#{userId} AND o.order_id=#{orderId} AND o.cart_id=x.cart_id AND xd.cart_id=x.cart_id AND o.cart_id=xd.cart_id AND a.address_id=o.address_id AND d.delivery_id=o.delivery_id AND xd.product_id=p.product_id AND n.neighbour_id=a.neighbour_id AND xd.tx_status=1
SELECT neighbour_id as neighbourId, name as name FROM `neighbour`
